article_title: Sexton: DSS rules, procedures no excuse for child abuse
article_text:

og.description: YADKINVILLE — Placed in order, a stack of arrest warrants that charge an Elkin couple with a gruesome array of child-sex offenses grows progressively more gut-wrenching with every turn of a page.
